welcome_message_body: Welcome to Englefield Green, a charming and picturesque town known for its beautiful parks, historic landmarks, and friendly community. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly Oneworld airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly SkyTeam airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly British Airways.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, with a 45-minute time limit. Premium Wi-Fi is also available for purchase.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the WiFi network for free, but it may be limited in certain areas of the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport is exclusively for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at RAF Station Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at RAF Station Airport, handling all freight and logistics operations.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at RAF Station Airport, catering to private and executive flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lasham Airport handles all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for passenger convenience.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lasham Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport terminal.
